subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As expected, the Mets placed outfielder Endy Chávez on the 15-day disabled list yesterday and activated second baseman José Valentín. The move reflected the way the Mets’ season has been going: Just when one player is healthy enough to return, another is injured.
